showerReviews.reviewText: This Swim center is severely outdated. There are no lockers, the locker rooms are square and small. The actual pool here is nice. It's generally Warner than the other swim centers, but even now in the heat, it feels cold, which is nice. ‚Ä¶

First time here Naomi and staff were wonderful she definitely was very helpful and kind over the phone and was able to answer all my questions prior to arrival! Once here the facility was perfect, clean and clear water and cold water temperatures! Highly recommended
I appreciate how they don't restrict what can be worn in the pool (besides needing to be clean, etc) unlike other places. ‚Ä¶

Pool 5, staff 5,  locker rooms 4, toilets 2, showers negative 5.
